Package com.pos.sdk.printer

package com.pos.sdk.printer
Printing module for KOZEN devices.

To use the printer, first instantiate POIPrinterManager with the application context, then connect to the printer with POIPrinterManager.open().

Then, define the printing data with TextPrintLine instances for text, and BitmapPrintLine for images.

To add the data to the printing process, use POIPrinterManager.addPrintLine(com.pos.sdk.printer.models.PrintLine) to add TextPrintLines and BitmapPrintLines.

Use POIPrinterManager.addBlankView(int) to add blank lines, and POIPrinterManager.addPrintLine(java.util.List) to add multiple columns of text (The TextPrintLines must have different text alignment).

To begin printing, use the POIPrinterManager.beginPrint(com.pos.sdk.printer.POIPrinterManager.IPrinterListener) method. The parameter is a listener that listens to start, finish and error events, and it must implement POIPrinterManager.IPrinterListener.

When done printing, use the POIPrinterManager.close() method to free the printer.
